CustomField.formula: IF( WorkRampTrainingType__c = "Challenge", HYPERLINK("https://app.workramp.com/admin/challenge_user_assignments/" &WorkRampId__c &"/review" ,"View Assignment on WorkRamp"), IF( WorkRampTrainingType__c = "Guide" , HYPERLINK("https://app.workramp.com/admin/guide_assignments/" &WorkRampId__c &"/submissions","View Assignment on WorkRamp"), NULL ))
CustomField.label: Link
